title: Amazon's 'Just Walk Out' tech is coming to airport stores in March
description: That didn't take long. One of the first stores in the US to feature Amazon's Just Walk Out checkout-free technology will open on March 16th, one week after the company announced it was licensing the platform to retailers. You'll find the store, a CIBO Express…
